def fact(num1):
    if num1<=1:
        return 1
    else:
        return num1*fact(num1-1)
     
import sys

for z in range(int(sys.stdin.readline())):
    data=map(int,sys.stdin.readline().strip().split())
    val=int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
    data.sort()
    vals=data[len(data)-val:]
    print fact(data.count(data[len(data)-val]))/(fact(vals.count(data[len(data)-val]))*fact(data.count(data[len(data)-val])-vals.count(data[len(data)-val])))
